Description: Steatite heart-scarab, elytra decorated with representations of Re and Osiris seated, pronotum decorated with lunar disc and two Wedjat eyes, feathered legs, laterally pierced at the front, base decorated with a representation of Osiris flanked by Isis and Nephthys.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
